text: Poplar is a city in Montana in the United States. It is in Roosevelt County. About 750 people lived there in 2020. Poplar is the seat for the Fort Peck Sioux and Assiniboine Tribes. This includes the tribal law enforcement agency, courthouse, and the Fort Peck Reservation correctional facility. The Poplar River joins the Missouri River near town. ==References== Category:Cities in Montana
title: Poplar, Montana
